name: Last Light (umang)
description:
"Last Light is an interactive fiction aimed to teleport the player into an abstract environment and bring an immersive experience through sound."

Controls: move - w/a/s/d, look - mouse, menu - Esc.

Requirement: Windows

The story:

This game is the abstract projection of your inner self, your body is still trapped underneath the debris because there has been an earthquake. You have ignored many things in the past and now feeling remorse over that attitude. There are a few objects hidden in the fog, they represent different phases/moments of life.

Gameplay:

You are in this mysterious environment, surrounded by fog. Follow the trails of the sounds that will lead you to different objects placed across the vast space, for now there are four. In the background, you constantly hear the sound of an earthquake.

Note: This is the result of an attempt to learn Unity and Scripting for the first time. It is a Prototype, there could be bugs with the build, though I tried my best to build a finished piece. I welcome the feedback. This works only for Windows at the moment.
